Class IdeopolyGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • IdeopolyGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class IdeopolyGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Class to contain the GUI of the game board. A new instance of the class creates the GUI and sets up various things in it. The game takes place mostly inside this GUI - the others are just there to get ya to the point where you can play the game.

    • Field Summary

      int playersArrSize 
      java.util.LinkedList<BoardPosition> positions
      Linked list that represents the 160 positions players can stand on.

    • Method Detail

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(Player p,
              Player p2,
              Player p3,
              Player p4,
              int numCells)
        Move the given Player p forward numCells (where numCells is # of board cells, not # of positions) on the list positions ON THE GUI. Also include players p2/3/4, because it's possible to affect them by moving a player.

      • updateDisplay

        public void updateDisplay()
        Update the GUI elements that display relevant stats and such.
